00013 namespace ndarray { namespace tables { namespace detail {
00014 
00015 struct SetOffsets {
00016 
00017     template <typename T, int N>
00018     void operator()(Field<T,N> & field) const {
00019         int element_size = sizeof(T);
00020         *alignment = std::max(element_size, *alignment);
00021         if (field.offset < 0) {
00022             if (!pack) (*bytes) += (*bytes) % element_size;
00023             field.offset = (*bytes);
00024         } else {
00025             if (field.offset < (*bytes)) {
00026                 throw std::logic_error("Field offsets are not compatible.");
00027             }
00028         }
00029         *bytes = field.offset + element_size * ((N == 0) ? 1 : field.shape.product());
00030     }
00031 
00032     explicit SetOffsets(bool pack_, int & bytes_, int & alignment_) :
00033         pack(pack_), bytes(&bytes_), alignment(&alignment_)
00034     {
00035         *bytes = 0;
00036         *alignment = 1;
00037     }
00038 
00039     bool const pack;
00040     int * bytes;
00041     int * alignment;
00042 };
00043 
00044 struct MakeColumns {
00045 
00046     typedef unsigned char Raw;
00047 
00048     template <typename> struct result;
00049 
00050     template <typename Func, typename U>
00051     struct result<Func(U)> {
00052         typedef typename FieldInfo<U>::ColumnValue type;
00053     };
00054 
00055     template <typename U>
00056     typename FieldInfo<U>::ColumnValue
00057     operator()(U const & field) const {
00058         typedef typename ndarray::detail::ArrayAccess< typename FieldInfo<U>::ColumnValue > Access;
00059         typename Access::Core::Ptr core = Access::Core::create(
00060             ndarray::concatenate(size, field.shape),
00061             manager
00062         );
00063         core->setStride(stride / sizeof(typename Access::Element));
00064         return Access::construct(reinterpret_cast<typename Access::Element*>(raw + field.offset), core);
00065     }
00066 
00067     explicit MakeColumns(int size_, int stride_, Raw * raw_, Manager::Ptr const & manager_) :
00068         size(size_), stride(stride_), raw(raw_), manager(manager_) {}
00069 
00070     int size;
00071     int stride;
00072     Raw * raw;
00073     Manager::Ptr manager;
00074 };
00075 
00076 template <typename Dim>
00077 struct ViewColumns {
00078 
00079     template <typename> struct result;
00080 
00081     template <typename Func, typename T, int N>
00082     struct result<Func(Array<T,N+1,N> const &)> {
00083         typedef Array<T,N+1,N> type;
00084     };
00085 
00086     template <typename Func, typename T, int N>
00087     struct result<Func(Array<T,N+1,N> &)> {
00088         typedef Array<T,N+1,N> type;
00089     };
00090 
00091     template <typename Func, typename T, int N>
00092     struct result<Func(Array<T,N+1,N>)> {
00093         typedef Array<T,N+1,N> type;
00094     };
00095 
00096     template <typename T, int N>
00097     Array<T,N+1,N> operator()(Array<T,N+1,N> const & x) const {
00098         return Array<T,N+1,N>(x[def]);
00099     }
00100 
00101     explicit ViewColumns(Dim const & dim) : def(boost::fusion::make_vector(dim)) {}
00102 
00103     View< boost::fusion::vector<Dim> > def;
00104 };
00105 
00106 template <typename Dim>
00107 ViewColumns<Dim> makeViewColumns(Dim const & dim) {
00108     return ViewColumns<Dim>(dim);
00109 }
00110
